mapper.select: select pc.pcId, pcImg1, pcImg2, pcImg3, pcChipImg, pcColorCode, pcPrice, psId, psStock, pSize from product_color pc left join product_stock ps on(pc.pcid = ps.pcid) where pc.pid = #{pId} and pc.pcid = #{pcId}

select pcolor.pcid, pcom.bname, pcom.pname , pcolor.pcimg1, pcolor.pcimg2, pcolor.pcimg3, pcom.pnote, pcolor.pcprice, pstock.psize, pstock.psstock from product_color pcolor inner join product_common pcom on pcolor.pid = pcom.pid inner join product_stock pstock on pstock.pcid = pcolor.pcid where pcolor.pid = #{pid} and pcolor.pcid =#{pcid}
select count(*) from likes where mid = #{mId} and pid = #{pId}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where mid = #{mId} and pid = #{pId}
mapper.insert: insert into likes (pid, mid, ltime) values (#{pId}, #{mId}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'))
mapper.select: select count(*) from likes where mid = #{mId}
SELECT PSIZE FROM PRODUCT_STOCK WHERE PSSTOCK != 0 AND PCID = #{pcId} ORDER BY PSIZE
SELECT pc.PCID, pc.PCCHIPIMG, pc.PCCOLORCODE, pci.COLORNAME FROM PRODUCT_COLOR pc, PRODUCT_COLOR_INFO pci WHERE pc.PCID = pci.PCID AND PID = #{pId} ORDER BY pc.PCID DESC
